name: Sahara Desert
description: The largest hot desert in the world, known for its vast sand dunes, oases, and extreme climate.

name: Thar Desert
description: Known as the Great Indian Desert, famous for its cultural heritage, sand dunes, and camel rides.

name: Gobi Desert
description: A cold desert known for its unique landscapes, dinosaur fossils, and nomadic culture.

name: Kalahari Desert
description: A semi-arid sandy savanna known for its wildlife and the indigenous San people.

name: Atacama Desert
description: The driest desert in the world, known for its salt flats, geysers, and otherworldly landscapes.
best_time_to_visit: March to May & September to November

name: Mojave Desert
description: Home to the famous Death Valley and Joshua Tree National Park, known for its extreme heat and unique vegetation.
